SELECT i.ITEM_ID AS itemId, i.ITEM_NAME AS itemName, c.TYPE AS type, TO_CHAR(s.STORE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS storeDate, i.STOCK AS stock, sh.PRICE AS price FROM item i LEFT JOIN store_history sh ON i.ITEM_ID = sh.ITEM_ID LEFT JOIN store s ON sh.STORE_ID = s.STORE_ID LEFT JOIN common_code c ON i.ITEM_TYPE_CODE = c.CODE WHERE 1=1
AND TO_CHAR(s.STORE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}
AND c.TYPE = #{itemSelect}
AND i.ITEM_NAME LIKE '%' || #{itemName} || '%'
AND i.STOCK > 50
AND i.STOCK BETWEEN 1 AND 50
AND i.STOCK = 0
GROUP BY i.ITEM_ID, i.ITEM_NAME, i.ITEM_TYPE_CODE, c.TYPE, i.STOCK, sh.PRICE, s.STORE_DATE
